page.title: 09Leisure and Recreation-contd
page.content:
When the children were interviewed, they gave their favourite recreation as playing sport such as football or activities such as running; cycling; swimming and roller skating.
Most children spend time watching television, mainly children's programmes but also some adult ones.
All the children we saw were members of some club such as Brownies, Guides, Cubs or Scouts whilst others were in a dance group or swimming club.
We found that a majority of both adults and children enjoyed the outside type of activity particularly where this involved being a member of an organised group.
